name: MDLAxisAlignedBoundingBox
desc: The minimal volume containing an object, used by the boundingBox(atTime:) method.

items.name: var maxBounds: vector_float3
items.desc: The corner of the bounding box with the highest x-, y-, and z-coordinate values.

items.name: var minBounds: vector_float3
items.desc: The corner of the bounding box with the lowest x-, y-, and z-coordinate values.
